Method Detail

handleRequest

Response handleRequest(HttpRequestHandler.Type type,
                       java.lang.String url,
                       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parameters)
Handle a request

Parameters:
type - the type of request
url - the url the user requested (relative to the host base, e.g. "/index.html")
parameters - a map of URL parameters where the key is the name and the value is the value
Returns:
a response response
